typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		name as string,
		description as string,
		version as string,
		entities as ({$type} as string, name as string, attributes as (name as string, dataType as string)[])[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 2,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> EmailsHeader
EmailsHeader sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['EmailsDataflow.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteToCSV
